ygData.subject: Re: the fp militia! :D
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe..thats funny..i will have to check that out. Too bad we have to kill Militia for their helms to get our Darkforge. Or you can hang out with a level 49
ygData.messageBody:
hehe..thats funny..i will have to check that out.
Too bad we have to kill Militia for their helms to get
our Darkforge.
Or you can hang out with a level 49 Necro who is
killing them and lets you take the looot :)
But i wouldnt know anything about doing that.

But of course the Militia are nothing but lackies to
the Shrine of Innoruuk anyway.
But this sounds more like a novelty "fun" more than it
being something useful.
But ya never know

--- Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...> wrote:
> as you may know, the freeport militia is "corrupt".
> i.e. they are on the
> side of Eeeevil. sort of. well, if you havent killed
> an excessive number of
> them, now YOU can actually join the militia
> reserves! i am not kidding :)
> ask guard valon at the tollbooth in wc for details.
>
> Beld Demonblade, Reserve Militia member (and i have
> the tunic to proove it ;)
> Fennin Ro
>
